thread.title_full: Signature Bank Names Stauffer to Leasing Division

title: Signature Bank Names Stauffer to Leasing Division
text:
Signature Bank Names Stauffer to Leasing Division August 14, 2015, 07:21 AM 
Signature Bank in Minnetonka, MN announced the recent addition of Mark L. Stauffer to its Lease Financing Division. Stauffer works closely within a diverse range of industries including a focus on telecom and technology. Prior to joining Signature Bank, Stauffer worked with GE Capital and Bank of America.
